hero_desc: A life operating system that automatically resets itself on the 1st of every month. Focus on this month, forget last month's burden.
eco_desc: Not just Habits. This is a complete toolkit to manage every aspect of your life in one dashboard.
eco_habit_desc: Core feature. Build new habits with daily checklists. Visualize your streak to keep the momentum.
eco_finance_desc: Track income & expenses simply. Stop the leaks.
eco_daily_desc: To-Do List for today only. Focus on what needs to be done now.
eco_goal_desc: Break big annual dreams into realistic monthly targets.
eco_journal_desc: Pour out your thoughts. Daily reflection to keep your mental health in check.
eco_job_desc: Track your job applications (Sent, Interview, Offer) or schedule your social media content.
prob_1_desc: Regular apps keep your failures visible. Unchecked boxes from last month still haunt you today. That's mental baggage.
prob_1_point_2: Broken streaks make you want to quit.
prob_2_desc: Habits on phone, Finance on laptop, Journal in a book. You waste energy just remembering which app to open.
prob_2_solution: DopaMind combines Habit & Finance in one simple Dashboard.
sol_card_1_desc: Daily checklist without the fuss. Visual progress tracking. Green means go, gray means skip.
sol_card_2_desc: Input expenses in 3 seconds. 'Coffee - 25k'. Done. See where your money leaks this month.
sol_card_3_desc: Every 1st of the month at 00:00, the system archives old data. You get a clean fresh sheet.
faq_q1: Is last month's data gone forever?
faq_a1: Nope. Your data is safely stored in the History Archive. You can review it anytime. But on the dashboard, they are hidden.
faq_a2: Yes. The Habit & Finance Tracker features you see now are FREE. We will release Premium features later, but basics stay free.
faq_q3: Can I use this on mobile?
faq_a3: Absolutely! The website is responsive. Open it on Chrome/Safari Mobile, it feels like a native app.
cta_final_desc: Don't wait for New Year to start. Start now, evaluate next month. Zero risk.
about_desc: An honest story about burnout, red notifications, and the search for sanity in a digital world.
story_1_p1: Our phones used to be full of productivity apps. Trello for work, Notion for ideas, Excel for finance. We thought it made us productive.
story_1_p2: In reality? We became slaves to apps. We spent more time 'organizing' tasks than actually doing them.
story_2_p1: We realized something was wrong. Modern apps force us to run a marathon with no finish line. Miss a habit one day, and you get punished with a broken streak.
story_2_quote: We need a system that forgives, not one that punishes.
story_2_p2: So we created the Monthly Reset concept. A 'Restart' button that gets pressed automatically on the 1st of every month.
manifesto_1_desc: Your data is your business. We are not an ad company. We don't sell your habit data to third parties.
manifesto_2_desc: New month = New sheet. Old data is archived. You don't carry the burden of last month's failures.
manifesto_3_desc: Anti-bloatware. We only include features you actually need to organize life. No cheesy gamification.
dev_desc: Built solo out of frustration with complex habit apps. I coded this to solve my own chaos, hoping it solves yours too.
user_desc: The first brave souls to try this system. You report bugs at 2 AM and suggest crazy features. You aren't just users, you are Co-Founders.
team_connect: Want to discuss features or vent about burnout?
cta_about_desc: Stop scrolling and start organizing your life. Takes 2 minutes to setup.
auth_confirm_desc: Sensitive area, Bro. Please confirm your password before proceeding just to be safe.
auth_reset_desc: Relax, don't panic. Enter your email below, we'll send a password reset link.
reset_desc: Please create a new secure password.
habit_empty: No active habits yet. Let's add one!
